15#ifndef DNS_ROOTNS_H
16#define DNS_ROOTNS_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/rootns.h */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21
22#include <dns/types.h>
23
24ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
25
26isc_result_t
27dns_rootns_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
28 const char *filename, dns_db_t **target);
29
30void
31dns_root_checkhints(dns_view_t *view, dns_db_t *hints, dns_db_t *db);
32/*
33 * Reports differences between hints and the real roots.
34 *
35 * Requires view, hints and (cache) db to be valid.
36 */
37
38ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
39
40#endif /* DNS_ROOTNS_H */
